attributes.action: Urgently Review and Action the current lack of Social Housing throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK has an increased Homeless Problem which is growing annually and affects ALL people from ALL back grounds.

The UK has a severe lack of Social Housing and the matter needs to be addressed urgently.

Telford and Wrekin alone has 

5287 applicants on the housing register.

44,000 applications by property type.

16,000 claiming housing benefit.

If the problem is that severe in Telford and Wrekin,

HOW BAD IS IT IS LARGER AREAS?

This matter needs to be addressed, not only for us, but also our children and future generations.

Please support this NOW !
